name: Development Build
body:
## Commits
- 918524d: Update update_grub2.sh (A1ive)

name: v7.4.0
body:
F1 now shows GRUB, CPU, Mainboard and RAM info
New Ctrl-F search function
F5 can boot to Ventoy and AIOBOOT

name: v7.3.3
body: Add F5 menu for AIO Boot and Ventoy.

name: v7.3.2
body: bugfix

name: v7.3.1
body: bug fix

name: v7.3.0
body:
add support for USM WinPE, Proxmox VE, Veket linux
add Danish language & keyboard
add UEFI screenshot module

add support for non-USA keyboards
add "Ventoy Compatible" ISO
New translations: fr_FR, uk_UA, es_ES, de_DE, pl_PL

Fixed windows image path contains spaces.
Added partnew for UEFI.

Add Hebrew (he_IL) translations (thanks to YaronSh).
Add NTBOOT for UEFI

支持 UEFI 下 map 启动 ISO/IMG/VHD (x86_64)
添加俄语支持
添加安全启动相关选项

name: v5.0.0
body:
支持 越南语 德语
删除 Python 相关模块
Update icons
Add support for Plop Linux Live
Add support for Android-x86 & BSD

支持 Debian/Ubuntu 中文 
支持 Ubuntu 保存数据 
支持 PCLinuxOS, 4MLinux
Add support for Kali 2017.1+ and Manjaro 17.0.1+
Add support for GParted , Clonezilla & BlackArch.
修复antiX ISO启动失败问题
gbk

grub 2.02-rc1 > 2.02-rc2
support i386-efi (untested) , x86_64-efi
Misc improvement
f2fs,fbfs,lua,linuxefi support
